underlying_goal: Implement Thread Editor for Twitter/X Platform Integration (SPEC-10), including format-aware routing, frontend components, and X-style post previews
friction_detail: Claude jumped straight into coding without reading the spec first, requiring user to interrupt and redirect with 'please study the spec first'.
brief_summary: User wanted to complete Thread Editor implementation for Twitter/X integration and fix post previews; Phase 3 was completed and a handover was generated, but the preview fix was deferred to next session.
